title: Memory of Christmas: from 'Act One' by Moss Hart
brief_description: A series of dramatic photographs illustrates playwright Moss Hart’s grievously impoverished childhood. The text, adapted from Hart’s autobiography “Act one” describes two Christmases a generation apart illustrating the gap that existed between himself and his father and how that gap was finally bridged.
